title: GoPro HERO 10 Teaser video previews new action cam coming September 16th!
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

Apple’s not the only one launching new tech this week. GoPro is set to release their new HERO 10 action camera on Thursday morning, September 16, 2021. It’s an annual upgrade, and the best we can tell from the teaser spot it’s using the same form factor as the HERO 9, and from the looks of this footage, there’s an emphasis on high quality footage from high frame rates…because there’s a lot of slow mo:

Stay tuned, we’ll have a full tech breakdown of the new camera Thursday morning, followed by an in depth review. Until then, there are plenty of “leaks” around the web, but no word on how legit they are.
author: Tyler Benedict
